1.content:
You wake up one morning groggy to a knock on your door, you go down the stairs and open your front door to find a small brown box and nobody else around.

There are no markings or labels on the box, but you decide to bring it in and check it out, you place it on the table and open it to find what seems to be a toy lazer gun, on the side is a dial with multiple settings represented by symbols such as a + and -, a dumbell, genders and what seems to be two arrows switching.

It's a pretty well made toy you think to yourself as you hold it up laughing to yourself, you take aim and pretend to shoot your microwave, suddenly a bolt comes out of the end of the pistol and the microwave shrinks for the entire time you are holding the trigger, you let go and run over and inspect it.

The microwave is still fully functional you find, it's just 1/3rd it's original size. You pinch yourself to make sure you're not dreaming.

A second test is in order you think to yourself, checking the side of the gun you noticed it was set to - before, so you switch it to + and fire at the microwave again, as you thought it begins to grow. You release the trigger leaving it slightly bigger than it's original size.

Your mind races at the possibilities of the gun you are currently holding in your hand.

Your mind turns to a local music festival and the amount of celebrities that would be present.

It's up to you to decide who you want to see Grow or Shrink!
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
You walk into town to grab a drink at a local bar and go over your plan.

By complete chance you see Taylor at the bar, you remember she is currently on tour in your city so she must be here taking some time off.

You imagine the possibilities of the gun can do and how she's the perfect target.

You take aim and warm up the device.

The gun fires and she...
11.title: Taylor Swift

113.content: You watch as the gun instantly makes her shrink to the size of an inch, but before she can start screaming you pick her up and put her in you pocket, you decide to have fun with her so you take her home. You get home but what should you do to her.
113.title: Shrinks

choices: She grows back to normal height
You decide she tastes good so you eat her
You decide to grow her parts so you can have more fun
1131.content: You decide to strip her down, she tries to defy you but you take off her bra and panties anyway. As you start to lick her body as she squirms. Something strange happpens.
1131.title: Strip her down

11311.content: She grows back to normal height, but in your astonisment, she kicks you, grabs the gun, and shrinks you down to an inch.
11311.title: She grows back to normal height

choices: Put him your vagina, after striping him down
113111.content: You are suddenly grown back to your normal height after a stupid freak, shrunk you, yes you Taylor Swift, down to the height of an ant, you decide to shrink him and give him a taste of his own medicine. As you kick him, and get hold of the gun, you have no hesitation to shrink him. As he shrinks to an inch. You notice there is a time setting. You say to him, "You idiot there is a time setting, and you know what I am going to shrink you down forever. You point it at the already shrunken man and he is even smaller and stuck that way forever. You look evily at him and think what to do with this power.
113111.title: Go to Perspective of Taylor

1131112.content: You look at him and you lick your lips finally deciding to eat him, so you pick him up of the bed and take his clothes off. When that is thru you stuck him in your mouth and suck at his body, as he screams for help, which will never come. You decide to give him a little hope, as you pull him out of your mouth. You say, actually I am not going to eat you, as you bring him to your eyes. Well, I am going to eat you but not by chewing, you throw him to the back of your throat, as he screams again only to be almost drowned by salvia, as he goes down your throat
1131112.title: Eating him

12.content:
You're at one of Katy's concerts and have a gun that can change the physical state and size of people,

At the end of the gig you get the chance to meet her and she is right in front of you,

You decide to...
12.title: Katy Perry

info.brief_description: Choose your celebrity and lets see her fill the skyline.
info.description:
You have the opportunity to grow any celebrity you like,

You can choose how they react to their new stature and what they decide to do with their power,

Add celebrities you feel I have missed, otherwise enjoy the ones already established,

Have fun!
